title: phishing
label: Phishing
description: Records network traffic patterns indicative of phishing attempts, including deceptive emails or fraudulent websites designed to steal sensitive information.

message.example: Detected phishing email from attacker.phishing@malicious-example.net attempting to impersonate the legitimate domain login-secure.bank-example.com. The email, flagged by Cisco Secure Email Gateway, contained a fraudulent login link targeting internal users including administrator.

suggestion.example: Block the source IP 93.184.216.34 at the network perimeter. Quarantine the phishing email and delete it from all mailboxes. Notify the recipient administrator and conduct user awareness training on identifying phishing attempts. Update email gateway rules to block future emails from attacker.phishing@malicious-example.net and the domain malicious-example.net. Reset credentials for the affected user administrator and monitor for suspicious account activity.

requestHeader.example:
Host: login-secure.bank-example.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/119.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.7
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.9
Cache-Control: max-age=0
Connection: keep-alive
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 125
Referer: https://login-secure.bank-example.com/login
X-Forwarded-For: 203.0.113.45, 198.51.100.33
Cookie: session_id=abc123def456ghi789; csrf_token=xyz789uvw456

responseHeader.example:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Thu, 26 Oct 2023 14:32:48 GMT
Server: Apache/2.4.41 (Ubuntu)
Set-Cookie: PHPSESSID=hacked789session; path=/; HttpOnly
Location: https://malicious-example.net/capture
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 256
Connection: close
X-Powered-By: PHP/7.4.3
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0
Pragma: no-cache

mailContent.example:
Dear Administrator,

Your login session for login-secure.bank-example.com has expired due to a recent security update. To ensure the safety of your account, please verify your identity immediately by clicking the link below.

Click here to verify your account now: https://login-secure.bank-example.com/login?username=administrator&redirect_to=https%3A%2F%2Fmalicious-example.net%2Fcapture

This is a mandatory security check. Failure to verify within the next 24 hours may result in temporary suspension of your account access.

If you did not request this verification, please contact our support team immediately at support@bank-example.com (Note: This is a legitimate support address).

Sincerely,
Security Team
Bank Example Corporation

This email was sent by the official security system of login-secure.bank-example.com.

mailSubject.example: Urgent: Your Account Verification Required for login-secure.bank-example.com

userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/119.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
